p: Rodent borne diseases also increase during massive rainfall and flooding. In Mazandaran, Gilan and Golestan provinces, distribution of some rodents were identified including: Rattus (R.) norvegicus, R. rattus, Apodemus sylvaticus, Arvicola, Mus musculus, Nesokiaindica, Cricetulus migrates and Rhombomys opimus ( 39). Hantaan, Puumala, Dobrava, Seoul and Nairoviruses are rodent borne viruses which have been recognized in Iran, then the outbreaks of these viruses after flooding might occur ( 40).
